WorkItem.ClosedComment: This appears to be working correctly with 0.9.1.1. I have set a <TypeScriptOutFile> property in my project file and things are working as expected. If that's not the case for you please re-open with your VS and TS versions that might be relevant.
WorkItem.Description:
The MSBuild VsTsc task for compiling TypeScript has an OutFile attribute, but setting this attribute does not cause it to pass an --out parameter to tsc.exe. I would like to override the standard generated output filename, but I can currently only accomplish this by using the Exec task to run tsc.exe.

From looking at the VsTsc task source code with Reflector, it doesn't look as if the OutFile attribute is used for anything but setting the GeneratedJavascript. This seems like a bug.
WorkItem.Summary: MSBuild VsTsc task does not pass --out parameter

Comments.Message: Thanks for the report, we'll take a look.
